welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sun City Center, where the sun always shines and the charm of our city awaits you. Known for its beautiful beaches and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whitted Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peter O'Knight Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights only.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Airside F
terminals.description: Airside F is one of four satellite terminals at Tampa International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
